text: Hey Emanuele. Are you back in Italy? Enjoying some time off? :wink:

Even thought this is not your chosen field, here is a site I thought was interesting on Matte Painting. 'Everything You Need to Know to Become a Matte Painter'. <https://magazine.artstation.com/2017/04/matte-painter/>

attachments.title: Everything You Need to Know to Become a Matte Painter - ArtStation Magazine
attachments.text: In films, Matte Painters are the creative and talented people behind making incredible photo-realistic landscapes or interior and exterior environments that you just can’t get on a real set. When it comes to Matte Painting, Saby Menyhei is a superstar in the entertainment industry with projects under his belt like Rouge One: A Star Wars Story, Thor: …
